cards.title: Warm-up Jog
cards.goal: Increase heart rate and prepare muscles for exercise
steps: Start with a slow jog in place
Cool down with slow walking for 2 minutes
safety: Warm up on a flat surface

cards.title: Shadow Boxing
cards.goal: Develop hand speed and footwork coordination
safety: Never punch a partner without protection
Maintain proper stance to avoid injury

cards.title: Heavy Bag Work
cards.goal: Build power and work on combinations
safety: Always wear hand wraps and gloves

cards.title: Speed Bag Drills
steps: Assume proper stance below speed bag
cues: Watch the bag at eye level
safety: Start at slow speed before increasing pace
Ensure bag is at correct height

cards.title: Core Strengthening
cards.goal: Build abdominal and back strength for stability
safety: Stop if you feel lower back pain

cards.title: Stretching Routine
cards.goal: Improve flexibility and reduce injury risk
cues: Stretch to point of mild tension
safety: Stop if you feel sharp pain

cards.title: Mitts Work
cards.goal: Work on combinations and accuracy with trainer
steps: Partner holds mitts at chest level
Throw jabs and crosses to targets

cards.title: Running for Cardio
steps: Warm up with 2 minutes slow pace
Run at steady moderate pace for 15 minutes
Cool down with 3 minutes slow pace
safety: Stop if you feel chest pain or severe fatigue

cards.title: Skipping Rope
steps: Hold rope handles at hip height
Jump over rope continuously for 2 minutes
safety: Jump on padded surface if possible
